Utterance: Jason, kemon achen, syar?
Thik aache.
Aponi thik achen?
Ami ekhane achi.
Aponi ekhane, shudhu ekhane. Ami bujhte parchi aponi koyek shoptoh aghe hospital-e achen.
Hyan, ami prai dui shoptoh aghe hospital-e chhilam kichu ekta korechilam ebong pore amake hospital-e jethe hoyechilo.
Ki hoyechhe?

Hyan, tai prai dui shoptoh aghe, ami amar ghor-e tairi kora ei dordanto machine-ti shesh korechilam, jate sorkar amar chinta ba amar, amar kaj ba amar acharon shunte na pare. Ebong ami shudhu amar shesh shomanno kaj-ti shesh koraar chesta korichilam ja amar tairi korar jonno dorkar chhilo ebong ami pratibeshir kache giyechilam, karon tader garage khola chhilo ebong kewal ekta tool ber kore bari-te firiye niye esechi. Ebong jokhon ami amar ghor-e kaj korichilam, tokhon police eshe amake tule niye hospital-e niye gelo. Tai etar moto, sorkari thottho pete dekhun.
Aponi ki mone koren sorkar ki korar chesta korche?

Tara asole amar room tairi kora theke amake thamano-r chesta korche. Karon tara, tara ei notun order tairi korche jekhane tara chai sobai tader onusoron koro. Ar ami onusari noi. Ebong ami jani ami ki chai. Ebong ami jani amar poribar ki chai ebong ami jani tader ki dorkar. Ebong ami shudhu amar ghor tairi kore tader rakkha korar chesta korchi.
Ebong amake apanar room shomporke bolun. Aponi sekhane ki korchen ja bishesh kore tole.

Tai ami jante shostho smart chhilam je sekhane emon frequency ebong taraang royeche ja sorkar apanake light-e ebong TV-e pathache ebong sekhane thaka protiti electronic jontropoti-r madhyome pathache. Ebong ami asole tairi korchi putul ba ekta taraang neutralizer jate eti asole ghotate baddho dite pare. Jate aponi prokritipokkho aponar pochondo moto jibonshapon korte paren ebong shorboda shukhi ebong tarunno ebong anondomoy thakte paren.
Jokhon aponi nirmanto korchen tokhon ki aponi emoni anubhob korechilen?

Hyan, karon ami amar ghor-e ei prototype-ti tairi korchi. Ebong je kono somoy ami mooloto sekhane ami chhilam, eta bhalo chhilo. Amar shakti chhilo. Ami jeta chai chhilo amar kache chhilo na. Kintu amar prototyper jwolani shesh hoiche. Ebong tai ami eti boro, brito kora proyozon, jate eti deero hote pare.
Aponi eti korar chesta korchen?

Hyan, ami etai korar chesta korchi jokhon ami amar pratibeshir kache theke soranjamguli dhar kortam na kintu hyan, ebong tarporo ami online kichu jinis order korchilam. Ebong setigulikeo pathanor kotha chhilo jate ami je base tokro-toti tairi korchi, ami amar pratibeshir bari-r jonno soranjamguli boshonto kori. Eti shomosto nikhu ebong seto kora jete pare jate baidyutik tarer shomosto hard drive ebong sei shomosto jinispatra pravesh korele ami kewal eti plug in korte pari. Ebong tar pore kebal ami amar ghortei noy, amar ghorgulio achchhadito ebong shomosto amar paribarer, tara shudhu sukhi hote pare.
Tara sukhi hote pare, tara sukhi hote pare, jemon aponi jane, aponi khushi chhilen.

Ami khushi chhilam, jemon, dui shoptah age, ami bhalo chhilam. Ami, ami uthechilam, ami tairi korar jonno proyojoniyo shomosto ganona korechhi. Tai ami asle amar systeme amar base tairi korte pari. Kintu tar pore ami ghore thaka bibhinn dhoroner torang somporkheo ganona korechhi, kintu tar pore ghorer baireo, je amaro ghumer proyojono hawar suyog chhilo. Ami klanto chhilam na. Ebong jodi ami ghumai, ami 15 minut er moto ghumiye chhilam, karon ami ja korate jachchilam ta shesh korte hobe. Ebong ami shesh korar khub kachakachi chhilam ebong amar pratibeshi polishe daklo.
Sutôrang apnar emon ekta somoy chhilo jokhon apnar prochur shakti chhilo ebong apni sotti khub beshi ghumani.
Sobai ki ta kore na?
Apnio khushi ebong udyomi bodh koren.
Ami bhalo anubhav korechi. Jemon ami jokhon ghumai tokhon ami jokhon ghumai tokhon ami pchondo kori na karon eta bhul mone hoy.
Ar ekhon tulona korle kemon lagche?
Ami thik achi. Thik ache. Thik ache, ekhoni. Shorkar hoteo bibhinno oshudh khechche. Tai sudhu thik ache.
Tai sukhi ba duhkhi noy.
Dukhito na. Majhkhaney shudhu tomi.
Apni ki sei sukher phire pette chan?
Oboshoi ke tader jiboner sukher phire pette chai na. Je karone apni machine shesh korte hobe.
Haan. Apni ullekh korchen je apni online kichu prodan order korechen. Apni koto order korechen?

Um, amar mone hoy ami order diyechilam shombhobot ami sotti shongkhati janina je ami 236-ti hard drive order korechi, karon 236 holo nikhotno number ja amar kewal amar bedroomer cover korar jonno proyojno chhilo na, tai ami sob somoy khushi hote pari ebong jodi systemti kharap hoye jay, amar room somoye achchadito kora jachhe. Kintu tar pore sei 236 er moddhe eti amar ghorkeo achchadito kora jay jate amar poribar sukhi hote pare, ebong amar charpashay amar char protibeshir moto jate amra sobai sukhi hote pari. Ebong sei karone ami amar ek protibeshir upor ekdhoroner raganvit karon ami amar grid er madyome tar bari antor bhukti korechilam jate se oi shob somoye khushi thakte pare.
Tini ekta machine dwara probohit hobe.

Oboshoi, tini sahayyer hat. Tini amake sahayyo korechen. Se amake tar shorongam dhara korte dey. Kintu sposthotho tini amake ebare take dhara dite deyni. Tai sudhu take tanun. Onno protibeshike take tar jagay niye bolun.
Oi shob hard drive ki motamuti byabhuhul chhilo?

Ami jani na. Jokhon ami porishkar korchilam ebong bariro charpashay daurachhilam tokhon aro sarongam khujte ber koraar chesta korchilam. Ami amar mayer purse khujhe peyechi ebong ami thik emon chhilam, oh my god, shekhane tar ekta credit card ache. Oh my god, ami amader credit card byabhohar korte pari. Tai ami amader credit card byabhohar korchilam karon eti take khushi korar chesta korchilo. Ebong tai ami jani na ami 236 jog korechi. Tader shombhoboth 50 theke $100 proti piece chhilo, eti tader kothay pete pare tar upor nirvor kore ebong ami tader order diyechilam.
Apnar ma er protikriya kemon chhilo?

Amar ma hospital-e eshe bollen, ei sob box kotha theke asche? Eta ei moto, kintu ami amar room-e achi. Ebong se amar room-e tader rakhha. Ebong tarpor, ek shaptah age, tar ache, ami amar credit card dekhte, ebong se ghote chay.
Eta ki adbhut sambhôrk?
Na, sadharanot amader sambhôrktā emon-i hoyeche.
Apani thik achhen, thik achhe.

Amra puro-puri thik hoye jai. Ero môto, amra eke oporer sathe kotha boli. Jemon, amra eke oporer sathe kom kotha boli, karon se amar ghôre nei, tai se khushi nôy. Tai je konu shômoy se amar ghôre ashe, eta bharasamya nôstô kore. Tai ami asukhi hoi, ebong tarpor ami take baire thakte boli yate ami khushi hote pari ebong se tar nijeṛ jagate sukhi hote pare.
Ebong apani ullekh korechen je tara hospital-e ôshudh poriborton koreche.
Ôshudher jônnô sôrkar poriborton hôyeche.
Apanar ôshudh khawar bishoye apani kemon anubhav korchen?
Jokhon tai.
Thik achhe, apani sotti ei machine-e kaj korte chan.
Hyā, ami amar sukhi jaẏagāẏa phire yēte chai.
Apani ki ei gôto kôeḳ shôptāhe nijekẏe tôṭa onuprāṇita peẏechen jemon apani hospital-e bhôrti hōẏār age chilen?
Ekhon? Ami je onuprāṇita kôra hoẏechen nā. Bôṛ. Ami jani ami eta shômponno kôrte jachchi. Eta shudhu ami jani na ami aj nā kāl eta shômponno kôrte jachchi, kintu ami jani ki kôra hōbe.
Apani ekhono eti shômponno kôrte chan. Eta jana jôruri.
Eta sotti ei gurutbhapūrṇa kôrôṇ ami ar sôrkar dôrā niẏôntṛita hōtē pari nā.
Jēson dwārā, ami chai apani ekhane ekjôn counselor-er sathe dekha chaliẏe jān. Apani jôdi paramôshdātāke shôhāy bôle mane kôreṇ.
Counselor thik achhe.

Kintu thik achhe, eta thik achhe. Kintu amra counseling chaliẏe jabo ebong asha kôri eti apanāke kichhuta shôhāy kôrte pāre. Ami amar sathe ei shômoy kaṭāte ebong ki ghôṭeche ta bôyakhẏa kôrar jônno apanār prashanshā kôri.
Apanāke dhônyabād.
